purpose.p: The objective of the "Software Development Planning" Process is to plan the software development tasks, communicate procedures and goals to members of the development team.
Systematic software development planning ensures that risks caused by software are reduced and quality characteristics for the medical device software are met.

base-practice.p: Establish a plan for the software development. Design the plan appropriate to the scope, the magnitude and the software safety classification of the software system.
Assign a software safety class to the software system according to the following classification:

ul.li: Class A: No injury or damage to health is possible
Class B: Non-serious injury is possible
Class C: Death or serious injury is possible

div.p: For each software system, until a software safety class is assigned, class C requirements shall apply.
